comments.body: Please add the connection type and link to the platform guide. Since extends_documentation_fragment is not used in resource module documentation it needs to be added explicitly.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +44,48 @@author: Nathaniel Case (@qalthos)
notes:
- Tested against Arista EOS 4.20.10M
- This module works with connection C(network_cli). See the
  L(EOS Platform Options,../network/user_guide/platform_eos.html).
